name: educational opportunities
description: Turns out, sharing really is caring.

name: Eddie Geller
description: \tI once appeared in a movie where the director commended me on my fake vomiting. Even though I'm no longer in Tinseltown, my dreams are as ambitious as ever (and often include me jumping into water with my cellphone): Let's get big money out of politics ...

name: Annie Reneau
description: I am a writer, wife, and mother of three with a penchant for coffee, wanderlust, and practical idealism. On good days, I enjoy the beautiful struggle of maintaining a well-balanced life. On bad days, I binge on chocolate and dream of traveling the world alone.

name: Upworthy Weekly
description: Upworthy’s first podcast is a lighthearted look at some of our most popular and engaging stories. It’s the perfect way to shake off the Monday-to-Friday news cycle with a refreshing dose of good news. For the best of humanity, delivered every Saturday ...

name: Erin Canty
description: When I was a baby, I'd laugh in my sleep. Since then, I've continued to find joy in the unexpected. I'm passionate about writing, big ideas, and improving my little corner of the world. I believe in equality, high fives, bass solos, and extra cheese.

name: Most Shared
description: A little creativity and a dash of compassion can truly work wonders.

name: Eli Pariser
description: I'm the co-founder of Upworthy. I formerly ran MoveOn.org and wrote the New York Times best seller "The Filter Bubble: What the Internet Is Hiding from You."

name: Evan Porter
description: I'm a storyteller at heart, and I'm grateful to live in a time when amazing stories have never been easier to find. I nerd out about cool technology that's making the world a better place, choke up at triumphant underdog stories and openly weep about ...

name: Robbie Couch
description: I'm a wandering writer with Michigan roots, an irrational fear of birds, and the belief that the world is slowly becoming a better place. You'll probably spot my name next to stories about LGBTQ news and pop culture happenings. Follow my shenanigans on ...

name: Parker Molloy
description: Parker Molloy is a feminist who cares a lot about culture, politics, media, and the Chicago Cubs. She enjoys taking naps and spending too much time on social media. She lives in Chicago with her wife. You can find her on Twitter or Facebook, if either is ...

name: Tina Plantamura
description: I am a perpetually grateful, hopeful yet cynical writer, mother, wife, seamstress, runner, and (closet) rap battler. I love stories of redemption, triumph, and forgiveness. I learned sewing from my Lola and writing from my heart. My unfailing perseverance ...

name: Simone Scully
description: I was born in Minnesota but grew up in France — I love cheese. I have a soft spot for animals, science, and figuring out how to protect our planet. When I’m not writing and editing, you can find me hiking trails and camping with my dog Odie or trying ...

name: child psychology
description: Many of kids' so-called 'bad' behaviors are actually normal developmental acts of growing up.

name: Eric March
description: Just your average red-blooded, all-American transit geek and musical theater fanatic. If you want to chat about dedicated bus rapid transit lanes or why "Sixteen Going on Seventeen" is actually a comedy song and not a ballad, join me on Facebook or Twitter.

name: Christine Schoenwald
description: I'm a writer, comedian, spoken-word diva, and cat lover. I have a degree in theater arts and pursued a career in comedy and improv at places like The Groundlings, ACME Comedy Theater, and Bang Comedy Studio before discovering my love for personal narrative ...

name: James Gaines
description: I was born in San Antonio to a line of writers and eccentrics and grew up in a cabin in the woods. I'm interested in natural history, the history of exploration, and what happens when things start to go weird. Here I am on Twitter.

name: Michael Calcagno
description: I'm a photojournalist and writer interested in telling unique visual stories. I'm fascinated by tall buildings, hand drawn maps, and old movies. I'm also never shaving my beard. You can follow me on Twitter.

name: Laura Willard
description: I'm an adoptive mom, a law school grad who has successfully avoided using my education for seven years and counting, a writer, and an editor. I feel strongly about equality, parenting, and not doing math. Come Tweet and Facebook with me.

name: Erin Leyba
description: Lover of bluegrass music, ice-cold swims, getting lost, and my rowdy family. Author of "Joy Fixes for Weary Parents," research-based ways to build more joy into family life. Looking for my next big adventure but also learning to stay awake for the tiny ...
